Texts.Eng:
A VERY high dosage of performance enhancers.
^cyan;+^white;350% ^cyan;Run^gray;, ^cyan;+^white;150% ^cyan;Jump^gray;, ^cyan;Feather Fall ^gray;(^white;24s^gray;) ^blue;Madness Gain^reset; 3
Texts.Chs:
高剂量的性能增强剂。
^cyan;+^white;350%^cyan;奔跑^gray;^cyan;+^white;150%的^cyan;跳跃^gray;^cyan;羽落^gray;（^white;24s^gray;）^blue;癫狂^reset;3.
